mapper.sql: id, sid, sname, business, classid, classname, phone, emergency, DATE_FORMAT(crttime,'%Y-%m-%d') crttime
mapper.insert: insert into studymeet (id, sid, sname,business,classid, classname, phone, emergency, crttime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emergency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now())

mapper.update:
update studymeet
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sname = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business = #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crttime = #{crttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
classid = #{classid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classname = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emergency = #{emergency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update studymeet set sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sname = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business = #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crttime = #{crttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, classid = #{classid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classname = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emergency = #{emergency,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from studymeet where sname LIKE concat('%',#{sname},'%')
